title: Christmas with the California Prunes
description: The 1986 classic holiday special featuring those cool singing dried fruits.
quote: We are the fruit that your grandmother loves.
altHero: a singing claymation prune with sunglasses and microphone
alt1: the prunes as characters of the nativity scene
alt2: Mary, Joseph, and baby Jesus watch another prune play the saxophone
alt3: prunes as the Three Wise Men
alt4: Mary and Joseph raise up baby Jesus who is wearing sunglasses and is very cool
